Description: Use Infusionsoft to automate your small business sales and marketing, while combining your CRM, email marketing, lead capture and e-commerce in one place.
Name: Infusionsoft by Keap

Methods.Name: Get Contact
Methods.Description: Retrieves the details of the specified contact.

Methods.Name: List Contacts
Methods.Description: Lists all contacts, optionally filtered by email, first name or last name.

Methods.Name: List Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: Lists contacts updated since the last run, optionally filtered by email, first name or last name.

Methods.Name: Upsert Contact
Methods.Description: A duplicate check will be performed. If a matching email address is found, the existing contact will be updated. If no match is found, a new contact will be created.

Methods.Name: List New Appointments
Methods.Description: Retrieves appointments for the authenticated user since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Appointments
Methods.Description: Retrieves appointments for the authenticated user.

Methods.Name: Add Tag To Contacts
Methods.Description: Apply a tag to a list of contacts.

Methods.Name: Remove Tag From Contact
Methods.Description: Remove a tag from a Contact.

Methods.Name: List Tags
Methods.Description: Retrieve a list of tags defined in the application.

Methods.Name: Get Account Profile
Methods.Description: Retrieves the details of the account profile.
